content: *bring the fun back into your kitchen crochet your own wonderful washcloth in bright colors and fun geometric shapes lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 80292ad skill level easy level 2 lion® cotton article #760 3 colors 1 ball each crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm work in pattern for 22 rounds available in three different sizes 80293ad 1 9 in 23 cm across 80292ad 11 in 28 cm across 80351ad 2 12 in 30 5 cm across 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/hexagon-washcloth-80293ad 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/hexagon-washcloth-80351ad
